document.full_text: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala's lead over right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori has narrowed to less than 4 percentage points, a poll ahead of the june 5 presidential election showed on thursday.
document.title: humala's lead over fujimori narrows in peru race
lines_and_colors: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala's lead over right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori has narrowed to less than 4 percentage points, a poll ahead of the june 5 presidential election showed on thursday.
